title: Token
body:
There is nothing more sad then when you have 910 tokens to go before getting 2500 but you've only got till the 20th of this month and its probably impossible. :((((

does anyone think I should still have hope? or give up and spend it on orbs? XD

replies.body: I mean, there's no harm in keeping the tokens until you can't earn anymore. I'd say it's probably unlikely you'll get enough for Prestige K/DA Kai'Sa, but there is still a possibility (however slim). Even without considering Prestige Kai'Sa, the loot will be around for a while yet (until the 3rd of December), and you'll have your pick of all of it (so long as you have enough tokens). No harm in waiting a few more days.

~~Just to clarify, the Worlds loot will be coming back and available for a while, but the K/DA loot will only be available until the 20th.~~

~~>[K/DA: November 3, 2018 at 9:00 p.m. AEDT – November 20, 2018 at 18:59 p.m. AEDT](https://oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/game-updates/special-event/learn-more-worlds-season-2018-event)~~

~~So OP has that long to earn enough for the Prestige skin :)~~

I take it all back, they've changed things :)

https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/360011804033

>Worlds, Tales from the Rift, and K/DA content will be available for crafting (except Worlds and Spooky Position Orbs) again between November 16, 2018 at 8:00 a.m. PT to December 3, 2018 at 11:59 p.m. PT.
I gave up and spent the money tbh. I don't have enough time to grind league for 2500 tokens
